posts.post_content:
Looking to either purchase or trade for Old Judges of Eb Beatin, Tom Loftus (Cleveland), and Jimmy Williams.  Also looking for other Cleveland OJ poses.  I have some SGC graded OJ's for trade, or will pay cash.  Please email me at: [url]EANGYAL@roadrunner.com[/url] if you have any of these available.  Thanks in advanced,

Eric
